name: Prose Quality Audit
description: Validates writing craft, detects AI slop patterns, checks voice consistency, and evaluates transition quality. This is the primary anti-slop gate. The Prose Quality Auditor reads the client component and evaluates prose independently from the producing agent.

any_of.description: Prose quality audit report with structured YAML frontmatter
Prose quality audit report (essay root level)

validations.description: Prose quality audit report must exist
Prose quality audit must not have FAIL status
Frontmatter status must not be FAIL

validations.regex: (\bdelve\b|\btapestry\b|\bunlock the secrets\b|\bin today's world\b|\blet's dive\b|\bfascinating journey\b|\bit's important to note\b|\bIn conclusion\b)
validations.description: Client component should not contain common AI slop phrases (delve, tapestry, unlock the secrets, etc.)
Client component must NOT contain emoji characters

voice_consistency.description: Prose maintains a consistent voice throughout — no jarring shifts between sections

ai_slop_detection.description: No filler phrases, empty transitions, or generic AI patterns. Every sentence earns its place.
anti_patterns: At the end of the day

transition_quality.description: Section transitions are earned and specific, not generic bridge sentences

specificity.description: Claims are backed by specific numbers, names, dates — not vague generalities

rhythm_and_pacing.description: Sentence length varies. Short sentences for impact. Longer sentences for explanation. Never monotonous.

notes: G6.6 is the prose quality gate — the primary defense against AI slop. It sits between Citation Audit (G6) and Scroll Certification (G7). The Prose Quality Auditor MUST be a different agent/session than the content producer (G5). The audit evaluates writing craft on five dimensions with weighted scoring. The regex_match validations catch obvious slop patterns in the contract enforcement layer, but the full audit report provides the detailed evaluation. Created per Gate Accountability Standard §Production+QA Interleaving.
